get.description: Handle Auth0 OAuth2 callback with PKCE code exchange
Redirect to Auth0 login page with PKCE flow

post.description: Create new user or restore soft-deleted user after Auth0 authentication

get.description: Get a list of all item types belonging to the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new item type with specified properties

get.description: Get a complete list of all item types with nested items and tags
get.summary: List all item types with full details

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific item type

delete.description: Soft or hard delete an item type. Use ?force=true for hard delete

patch.description: Update an existing item type belonging to the authenticated user. Set picture_id to null to remove the picture.

404.description: Item type or picture not found

get.description: Get a list of all items belonging to the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new item associated with an item type

get.description: Get a list of items with nested tags, optionally filtered by item type
Retrieve detailed information about a specific item

delete.description: Soft or hard delete an item. Use ?force=true for hard delete

patch.description: Update properties of an existing item

post.description: Upload a new image file (max 10MB). Supported formats: JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF

400.description: Invalid file or image file required

get.description: Serves an image file from the static directory
Retrieve metadata information about a picture without downloading the file

delete.description: Permanently delete a picture and its file if not referenced by other users

get.description: Get a list of projects with optional filtering and sorting

post.description: Create a new project which is set to 'Planning' state
Create a new project in 'Planning' state, copying planned metrics and resources from a template

get.description: Get a list of all tags belonging to the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new tag and optionally associate it with an item or item type

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific tag including associated items and item types

delete.description: Permanently delete a tag (hard delete only)

patch.description: Update properties of an existing tag

post.description: Create a new template for future projects
Creates a new template by copying plan/actual metrics and resource specs from a project
post.summary: Create template from an existing project

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's profile information from Auth0

delete.description: Permanently delete the authenticated user's account from both Auth0 and the database

patch.description: Change the authenticated user's password via Auth0

finalize_inventory.description: NOTE(pencelheimer): If true, remaining reserved but unused items are returned

BearerAuth.description: Enter your bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
